column4: QUESTION: |   I just installed Ubuntu 8.04, but I can't boot, it says "Unable to Boot - Use a kernel appropriate for this CPU". I get the same message if I try recovery mode. What can I do?
Did you install the amd64 version on an x86?
I did not, I have a intel :P so I use x86
I still have the ISO on my desktop and it says it's i386
